title: Adapsyn Bioscience
description: Adapsyn Bioscience is a chemical bioinformatics company that was established in 2016. The company was spun out of McMaster University in Hamilton, Ontario, based on an early collaboration with Pfizer. The vision behind its inception was to discover novel molecules for development as therapeutics, and for use in agriculture, food, and nutrition.
address: Maass Chemistry Bldg, 801 Sherbrooke St W room 440, Montreal, QC H3A 0B8, Canada
